title: Pipeline logger not used in Windows builds
body:
Right now, Arcade's pipeline-compatible logger is used in bash-driven builds like

https://dev.azure.com/dnceng/public/_build/results?buildId=384065&view=logs&j=0ddb6181-8b1d-5386-35d2-ca21a772cde8&t=a36a8187-bb52-5aa3-80a2-ccc76a822779&l=37

but is not used in the equivalent powershell-driven builds like

https://dev.azure.com/dnceng/public/_build/results?buildId=384065&view=logs&j=a964745c-2ee7-5657-5893-57d8a23ba1c9&t=8546657c-07f1-5ad9-84b8-0e3e313ae4c2&l=17

This results in missing GitHub Checks annotations when errors aren't plumbed all the way through.
